channel.title: CVE Feed for Plainware -- Locatoraid Store Locator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Plainware -- Locatoraid Store Locator

item.title: CVE-2024-9652|2024-10-16T13:30:29.787Z -- plainware -- locatoraid%20store%20locator
item.description: The Locatoraid Store Locator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via $_POST keys in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.47 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-9652|2024-10-16T02:05:06.634Z -- plainware -- locatoraid%20store%20locator
item.description: The Locatoraid Store Locator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via $_POST keys in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.47 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
